data.persona: My dream is to be a famous chef. I love to cook. I would like to build a restaurant someday.
data.description:
You are in the Palace Kitchen.
A lavish kitchen where the aroma of food can be smelled from miles away. Hundreds of servants and cooks weave and jostle about as they prepare for the next meal of the day. The meal they are cooking smells divine.
There's a mug, a food, and a plate here.
The old men is here.

You are carrying a cutting board, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I am mockfighting the old man
data.mid_motivation: I want to keep the old man in good mood
data.long_motivation: I want the old man to be happy and feel loved when his time comes to pass away
